name: Die To Live (mongmongstudio)
description:
The world is at peace. but resurrected the forces of darkness so that the world is no longer peaceful.

The former king is resurrected and given a mission to destroy the stone of darkness.

FEATURES
  • Power of Resurrection: Death is not the end
  • Elemental Reaction : Mix Elemental Magic
  • Deadly Puzzle : Death Make you Learn.
